ValidationRule.description: Makes Reason Lost Required when an opportunity is saved with "Lost", "No Decision" or "Disqualified"
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name, "System Admin")), ISCHANGED( StageName), ISPICKVAL( Reason_Not_Sold__c ,""), OR(ISPICKVAL( StageName ,"Lost"),ISPICKVAL( StageName ,"No Decision"), ISPICKVAL( StageName ,"Disqualified")))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Reason Lost is required when the opportunity is Lost, No Decision or Disqualified.
